description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nCannibalistic Tendencies:
After your creatures {ACTION_provoke}, they are killed, and your other creatures gain 20% of their {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_defense}, and {STAT_speed}. This trait does not stack.
name: Mutant Foot
